title: Social Integration Simulation-Based MOOC Design for Citizens Aged 40+

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Virtual social problem-solving activities using VR devices, with content structured according to age-specific cognitive characteristics

learning_goals: Analyze community conflict cases and propose collaborative solutions in a virtual simulation environment

After performing 3 VR-based role-play scenarios (generational conflict, cultural differences, disability understanding), learners achieve 4+ points (5-point scale) in 4 of 5 empathic communication skills (active listening, nonviolent communication, situation-appropriate responses) from 2 peer evaluators and 2 observer evaluators
Demonstrate social problem-solving competencies by performing at least three project-based assessments using digital tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
